74fb73bc-aff2-453d-9f5e-d0affd2e9396.content: Hi there! I'm ESI, your AI dissertation assistant, ready to help you navigate your research journey.

messages.content: Hi there! I'm ESI, your AI dissertation assistant, ready to help you navigate your research journey.

suggested_prompts: I need to develop my research questions.
I have my topic and I need help with developing hypotheses.
I have my hypotheses and I need help to design the study.
Can you help me design my qualitative study?
